comments.content:
Hi Eric,

some similar square tech sans faces (most of them of pretty rough & unpolished ‘charme’):

- [Baksheesh](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/www.identikalshop.com/font_ind.php?baseProductID=107) by [Stuart Brown](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Stuart%20Brown)
- Blender and Regular by [Nik Thoenen](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Nik%20Thoenen) via [Binnenland](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/www.binnenland.ch/type/)
- [BDR Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/www.gestalten.com/fonts/detail/?id=be0db8100998aaec010a4f5def8e0003) by [Lopetz](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lopetz)
- [AutoScape](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/AutoScape/) and [Lutz Headline](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Headline+Fonts/Lutz+Headline/) by [Cornel Windlin](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cornel%20Windlin) (also [Alpha Headline](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Custom+Typefaces/Alpha+Headline/), available again in 2012)
- [Arame](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dimitrelima/0arame/familytree.html) by [Dimitre Lima](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Dimitre%20Lima)
- [Screener](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/www.canadatype.com/showfont.php?id=38) by [Patrick Griffin](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Patrick%20Griffin)
- [Super Duty](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeco/super-duty/) by [James Grieshaber](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/typophile.com/wiki/James%20Grieshaber)
- [T26 Carbon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/carbon/) and [T26 OCRX](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/ocrx/) by [Anuthin Wongsunkakon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Anuthin%20Wongsunkakon)
- [United Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=531&subpage=un_fonts_sans) by [House Industries](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/typophile.com/wiki/House%20Industries)
- [some of the Neubau fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/www.neubauladen.com/catalogue/NB-Typography/3).

Also have a look at [License plate typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27362).  
F

thanks a lot Florian,

I will take a look at these.

eric

Great list from Florian. I'll add one more. This is [Sinclair](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontsmith/fs_sinclair_bold_ot/?sample_text=IT%E2%80%99S%20ANYONE%E2%80%99S%20GAME.).

Would love to know where you saw the sample.
some of the ones from [http://www.typedifferent.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134902/http:/www.typedifferent.com/ "http://www.typedifferent.com/") might also fit...
